title: 113_s1947
content: Government Publishing Office Act of 2014 - Redesignates the Government Printing Office (GPO) as the Government Publishing Office and the Public Printer and the Deputy Public Printer as the Director of the Government Publishing Office and the Deputy Director of the Government Publishing Office, respectively. nbsp, Eliminates as a requirementnbsp, for such positions that suchnbsp. Officers be practical printers and versed in the art of bookbinding. nbsp,
